BAR_LowSP_6.5MW_234
===================

====================
Link to Tabular Data
====================

A .csv file is available on `GitHub <https://github.com/NREL/turbine-models/blob/master/Onshore/BAR_LowSP_6.5MW_234.csv>`_.

==============
Key Parameters
==============

+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Item                   | Value                   | Units          |
+========================+=========================+================+
| Name                   | BAR LowSP 6.5MW         | N/A            |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Rated Power            | 6500                    | kW             |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Rated Wind Speed       | 8.5                     | m/s            |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Cut-in Wind Speed      | 4                       | m/s            |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Cut-out Wind Speed     | 25                      | m/s            |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Rotor Diameter         | 234                     | m              |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Hub Height             | 150                     | m              |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Drivetrain             |                         | N/A            |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| Control                |                         | N/A            |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+
| IEC Class              |                         | N/A            |
+------------------------+-------------------------+----------------+

=======
Sources
=======

Big Adaptive Rotor (BAR) Project at NREL:
https://www.nrel.gov/wind/big-adaptive-rotor.html

BAR report:
https://www.nrel.gov/docs/fy19osti/73605.pdf

Tall Towers report:
https://www.nrel.gov/docs/fy19osti/73629.pdf
